name: Santa's Extra Helper
description:
Santa needs extra help this year, we all could, so hes employed some penguins to help out with the gift wrapping.

Santa's Extra Helper is a simple puzzle game about pushing and flipping unfinished presents for Santa.

Simply close all sides of the present and position it over the red ribbon on the ground to complete the level.

Controls:

  • WASD / arrow keys to move
  • Z to undo
  • R to reset level

I hope you have a good Christmas :D

sounds done with BFXR
